parameters.name: DataDisk.1.Size
parameters.description: The size of the data disk. Unit: GB. If you specify this parameter, this parameter takes precedence over the Size property in DataDisks.

parameters.name: DataDisks
parameters.description: If you leave DataDisk.1.Size empty, the value that you specified for this parameter is used.

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ENS node.

parameters.name: InternetChargeType
parameters.description:
The bandwidth metering method of the instance. Valid values:

*   BandwidthByDay: Pay by daily peak bandwidth
*   95BandwidthByMonth: Pay by monthly 95th percentile bandwidth
*   PayByBandwidth4thMonth: Pay by monthly fourth peak bandwidth
*   PayByBandwidth: Pay by fixed bandwidth

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the instance.

*   If you leave the PeriodUnit parameter empty, the instance is purchased on a monthly basis. Valid values: Day and Month.
*   If you set PeriodUnit to Day, you can set Period only to 3.
*   If you set PeriodUnit to Month, you can set Period to a number from 1 to 9, or set Period to 12.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The billing cycle of the ENS instance. Valid values:

*   Month (default):
*   Day

parameters.name: SystemDisk.Size
parameters.description: The size of the system disk. Unit: GB.
